name: The Long Walk
description:
Battle Royale Walking Simulator inspired by the Stephen King Book by the same name. Made for Ludum Dare 41

It's my first attempt to make a 3D game and is also the first game that I have actually made in 48 hours!

This game has a little "user-generated" feature: it's not in real time, so don't expect to see your "content" right after you have finished playing :-)
